cause.description:
Cary Greenwood and MAtt Rybarczyk plan to make a Slip N' Slide which will break the world record of 300ft. We reall could use money and support.
1. Break a world record
2. Possible Telivision appearences
cause.mission: Beat the world record of 300ft in a functioning Slip N' Slide
cause.name: Slip N' Slide World Record
